name: 哲學概論
syllabus:
Week 01 (14 February)                   Introduction to the Course

Week 02 (21 February)                   The Spirit of Philosophy

Week 03 (28 February)                   Holiday (Peace Memorial Day)

Week 04 (07 March)                       The Method and Substance of Philosophy

Week 05 (14 March)                       “Introduction”

Week 06 (21 March)                       Chapter 1: “Knowledge”

Week 07 (28 March)                       Chapter 2: “Mind”

Week 08 (04 April)                         Holiday (Children’s Day)

Week 09 (11 April)                         Chapter 3: “Free Will”

Week 10 (18 April)                         Chapter 4: “The Self”

Week 11 (25 April)                         Chapter 5: “God”

Week 12 (02 May)                          Chapter 6: “Reasoning”

Week 13 (09 May)                          Chapter 7: “The World”

Week 14 (16 May)                          Chapter 8: “What to Do”

Week 15 (23 May)                          Feedback on Assignments (I)

Week 16 (30 May)                          Feedback on Assignments (II)

Week 17 (06 June; optional)          A Personal View of Why Philosophy Matters (I)

Week 18 (13 June; optional)          A Personal View of Why Philosophy Matters (II)

methodologies.note: Analysis and interpretation of core concepts.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
